abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32447297, pmid32447293, pmid32447283, pmid32450906, pmid32447373, pmid32447443, pmid32451358, pmid32449766, pmid32445496, pmid32445279, pmid32450754, pmid32447496, pmid32445287, pmid32445580, pmid32447429, pmid32451602, pmid32446287, pmid32447798, pmid32449044, pmid32447746, pmid32452147, pmid32450943, pmid32449676, pmid32445195, pmid32451547, pmid32447801, pmid32445579, pmid32447057, pmid32447721, pmid32447571, pmid32452556, pmid32447647, pmid32450726, pmid32446305, pmid32446285, pmid32445134, pmid32447059, pmid32445440, pmid32445489, pmid32445484, pmid32449329, pmid32447820, pmid32449791, pmid32447777, pmid32445512, pmid32448039, pmid32445283, pmid32449770, pmid32447301
